poem:
Title: "The Waiting Room Rhythms"

Lists, like reluctant rivers, run, 
endless parade of patience undone.
Surgical anthems on mundane tongues, 
amidst sterile echoes, a hope song is sung.
Should the fall of waiting begin at its height,
or softly, slowly, in the silence of night?
Till the dawn of a decade, we must endure,
healing's hush, both the cause and cure.
